title: The Hook Group
body:
The Hook is one of the world's largest social media groups, known for creating awarding winning original content for over 10 million fans. The site features a bold red theme, lots of movement thanks to embedded video, horizontal navigation and clever image reveal effects. Check out [them out](https://www.thehookgroup.co.uk/)!
![The Hook Group About Page](/images/uploads/thehookgroup-1.jpg)
![The Hook Group Landing Page](/images/uploads/thehookgroup-2.jpg)
